subject: RE: [junit] Ann: "Test-Driven Development: A Practical Guide"
msgSnippet: Salil, ... good ... May I dare propose my book: JUnit in Action (http://www.manning.com/massol)... :-) If you re looking for a book specifically on TDD you
messageBody:
Salil,

> -----Original Message-----
> From: salil khanwalkar [mailto:k_salil@...]
> Sent: 10 July 2003 17:50
> To: junit@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: [junit] Ann: "Test-Driven Development: A Practical Guide"
>
> Hi Dave,
> Will be the book wil be available in India as an Indian Edition(not US
> Edition). What will be its cost? Can u please suggest me some more
good
> books?

May I dare propose my book:

JUnit in Action (http://www.manning.com/massol)... :-)

If you're looking for a book specifically on TDD you should certainly
pick Dave's or Kent's.

Now, if you ask me whether JIA will be available in the Indian edition,
I don't know. I'll need to ask Manning.

Thanks
-Vincent

[snip]
